sense.def:
To press one thing against another
pomeni potisniti eno stvar ob neko drugo.

seg.quote: Stroganov pressed his hand to his heart.
The animal presses itself against a tree trunk.

sense.def:
To press a button or switch
pomeni potisniti gumb ali stikalo s prstom.

seg.quote: Mrs Carstairs pressed an electric bell.
All this can be called up at the press of a button.

sense.def:
To press on something
ali
to press something
pomeni potisniti nekaj z roko ali nogo.

seg.quote: She pressed down upon the velvet cloth.

sense.def:
To press clothes
pomeni isto kot
to iron
.

seg.quote: He always pressed his trousers before wearing them.

sense.def:
To press for something
pomeni zelo se truditi, da bi nekoga prepričali, naj nam nekaj da.

seg.quote: He pressed for full public ownership.

sense.def:
To press someone
pomeni zelo se truditi, da bi nekoga prepričali, naj nekaj naredi ali reče.

seg.quote: He pressed me to have a cup of coffee with him.

sense.def:
To press something on someone
pomeni vztrajati, naj nekdo nekaj vzame.

seg.quote: His aunt was pressing upon him cups of tea and cookies.

sense.def:
To press charges against someone
pomeni nekoga uradno obtožiti nečesa, o čemer mora potem razsoditi sodišče.

Izraz
the Press
se nanaša na časopise ali novinarje, ki ustvarjajo časopise.

seg.quote: I got to know a lot of the American press.

sense.def:
A printing press
je stroj, ki se uporablja za tiskanje knjig, časopisov in letakov.

To press on
pomeni kljub težavam nadaljevati nekaj, kar delamo.

seg.quote: They courageously pressed on with their vital repair work.
